Title: Understanding Dependency Injection in .NET   ----- HM
Content: Dependency Injection (DI) is a design pattern used to implement IoC. It allows the creation of dependent objects outside of a class and provides those objects to a class in different ways.

Title: Exploring C# 9.0 Record Types
Content: C# 9.0 introduces record types, which are a reference type that provides synthesized methods to provide value semantics for equality. Records are immutable by default.

Title: Building RESTful APIs with ASP.NET Core
Content: This article explores how to build RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core, focusing on the new features and improvements that .NET 5 and .NET 6 bring to the table.
